She is positive her business will succeed because she has a good business site, her restaurant is always very neat, attracting new customers and retaining old ones.  She does the heads of customers well and this attracts new customers to her salon.  With this salon, the community will not travel long distances in search of food or to do their hair.  Men will also buy caps from her at low prices and all of her products will be of good quality.

With the profits from the loan, she will plough back, invest in agriculture and also buy farm seedlings.  She says GHAPE loans are preferable because of the low interest rate and convenient repayment intervals.

loans.use: to buy hair products for her salon.

loans.name: Tanyong Abigail

texts.en:
Tanyong Abigail lives with her child in a two-room house in Bamenda, Mezam Division of the North West Region of Cameroon.

This single mother has faced so many challenges in life, among which are sickness of her mother, making her spend the little money she can raise on hospital bills, purchase of medicines and taking care of her child. She has inadequate finances to provide a good educational foundation for her child who is still a teenager.

She joined GHAPE in 2010, and has managed and successfully repaid her loans. With the new loan she has requested, she will buy hair products, like hair mesh, hair oil, hair treatments and hair caps, buy jewelry, such as rings, bracelets, bangles and watches, buy inner wear and chicks. She holds a strong view on her business succeeding because of longevity in the business and regular customers, and she also has a good site to maintain customers and attract new ones. With this business, the community will maintain beauty at moderate prices, the chick will serve in ceremonial activities and the droppings from the chick will serve as manure for agriculture which will improve yields.

The profit from this loan will be used for her child’s education, feeding her family, and also she will reinvest some of the profit back into her business to expand the business.

loans.use: to purchase inner wear, jewelry and hair products for resale.

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en: Nadia is a 35-year-old married woman who is looking after her five children and is working at her mini market selling different types of food products. She has applied for this loan to increase the quantity she has of goods in the store.

loans.use: to increase the quantity of goods that she sells.

loans.name: Fadda

texts.en: Fadda, a 51-year-old conservative woman, asked her son to appear in the photo. Fadda and her son work together in their clothing store to support the rest of the family as Fadda has six other sons and daughters. Fadda has applied for this loan to bring a new winter collection to the shop.

loans.use: to bring a new winter collection to the shop.

loans.name: Aasia

texts.en: Aasia is a 41-year-old married woman; she lives in a small house with her husband and a daughter. When her husband failed to find employment, Aasia decided to use a skill her mother had taught her at a very young age and earn something for her family. She started sewing for women in the neighborhood. She approached Kashf requesting a loan of Rs. 20,000. She plans on buying a new sewing machine and materials, such as spools of thread, packs of buttons, laces and zips in different colors, so she can meet the growing needs of her customers. Aasia is passionate about her work, and informed the Kashf officer that she is planning on preparing fancy dresses so she can sell them to retailers in the city of Rawalpindi.

loans.use: to buy a new stitching machine and materials, such as spools of thread, packs of buttons, laces and zips in different colors.

loans.name: Slivy

texts.en: Slivy is a 31-year-old hardworking man living in Kasese, Uganda. He sells salt, which he directly mines from Lake Katwe, one of the salt lakes in Uganda, and he also buys from other miners.With the money earned, he has been able to pay school fees for his siblings and build a house for his residence. His major challenges are the prolonged rainy season, which makes mining hard, and lack of appropriate protective gear, which poses a health hazard. His dream is to set up a salt processing plant, since they have to transport the salt to another district for processing. Slivy is requesting a loan to buy salt to resell.

loans.use: to buy salt to resell.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en: Iman, 30 years old, is a married woman. Her husband is a soldier supporting his family of four. Iman started selling clothes at home to help improve their living conditions; she now has applied for a youth loan to buy more winter clothes from the wholesale market and free zone market.

loans.use: to buy more winter clothes for resale.

loans.name: Jamila

texts.en:
Jamila is a 61-year-old married woman, and mother of three. She has been working as a baker since 1995, baking Saj bread, which is a typical Traditional Lebanese bread. This lengthy experience helped her in gaining customers' trust and having her name well known in the region.

Jamila is a hard working woman, with a very good reputation. She applied for a loan from Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua, in order to increase her business capital with a special discount for flour and oils requested. Jamila will also help her son in his marriage preparations and needs.

Jamila has been an Al Majmoua borrower for ten consecutive cycles; all of her previous loans helped a lot to improve her business and increase her income. 

Most of her customers say that her Manakish, which is also a Lebanese traditional breakfast sandwich similar to pizza but folded with special thyme, cheese, or minced meat toppings, have the best taste ever in the region.

She hopes to stay in a good health, and to keep on improving her business as much as she can.

loans.use: to increase her business capital with a special discount for flour and oils requested.

loans.name: Najwa

texts.en: After receiving her first loan, Najwa bought perfumes and some cosmetic products that were requested by her customers. Recently, she ran out of perfumes and is looking to obtain more, so she applied for another loan to increase the quantity she has of accessories and perfumes in order to increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetics products and perfumes.

loans.name: Halima

texts.ru: Халима  обратилась в МДО "Арванд" чтобы  отремонтировать свой дом.   К великому сожалению она несколько лет тому назад осталась без мужа, но дети у нее взрослые и помогают чем могут.   После сильного дождя весной у Халимы дома   начала протекать крыша.   Но в то время у нее не было денежных средств чтобы провести ремонт. Крыша так и осталась не ремонтирована,сейчас осень идут дожди и ремонт крыши необходим.  На полученный кредит Халима хочет купить строительные материалы и наконец отремонтировать протекающую крышу своего дома.   Она заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Halima came to MDO Arvand to make repairs on her home.  It is with great sadness that Hamila was left without a husband a few years ago, but her grown children help her as they are able.  After heavy rains this spring, Halima's roof began to leak.  But at that time she didn't have enough money for the repairs, so the roof went unmended.  Now the rains have started again and roof repairs are absolutely necessary.  On receiving her loan, Halima wants to buy building materials and finally fix her leaky roof.  She thanks Arvand in advance for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Ellen

texts.en: Ellen is 35 years old and lives in Airport. She is married and has five children between the ages of 6 and 16, who are in school and live at home. Since 1997, she has been selling palm oil in the local market. She learned this way of selling from her mother and enjoys the profit she makes from her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil for her business. Her plans are to buy a piece of land and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for her business,

loans.name: Reyah

texts.en: Reyah is a 40-year-old married woman looking after her family of five. She is helping her husband by selling blankets to friends and neighbors at home. She applied for this loan to increase the quantity of blankets and bed covers in preparation for the upcoming winter season.

loans.use: to buy more blankets and bed covers for resale.

loans.name: Akbar

texts.ru: Акбар молодой человек в возрасте 31 года.   Он женат имеет двоих детей.   Его жена домохозяйка, занимается воспитанием детей.   Акбар занимается откармливанием  скота   у себя дома.   Он имеет несколько голов скота и одну дойную корову который каждый день дает по 10-12 литров  молока.   Жена Акбара  продает   молоко  своим соседям и имеет небольшой доход от этого.   Акбар этим видом деятельности  занимается  более 10 лет. Животноводство это их единственный доход, поэтому Акбар  хочет  расширить свой бизнес.   На полученный кредит он планирует купить скот и увеличить поголовье скота. Акбар заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Akbar is a young man of 31 years of age. He is married and has two children. His wife is a housewife, who raises the children. 

Akbar works with fattening cattle at his home. He has some cattle and one dairy cow that gives about 10-12 liters of milk every day. Akbar's wife sells the milk to their neighbors and gets a small income from this. Akbar has been engaged in this type of activity for more than 10 years. 

The livestock breeding is their only income and therefore Akbar would like to expand his business. For the loan received, he plans to purchase cattle and increase their number. Akbar thanks Arvand in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy hay and cattle feed to sell

loans.name: Bakary

texts.fr: Monsieur Bakary habite au Sénégal dans l’une des banlieues. Il est marié et  s’active depuis 20 ans dans le domaine de la couture. Il démarre son activité a 7h du matin pour rentrer a 21 heures le soir. Ses revenus lui permettent de prendre en charge le loyer et la dépense quotidienne de la famille. Il est membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC de la localité ou il vit et a déjà remboursé 3 crédits antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 200 000 prévu pour l’achat d’une machine a coudre dans la but de rendre plus performante son activité de couture. Avec le développement de son activité il souhaite diversifier les produits et services qu’il offre a sa clientèle, élargir le nombre de ses employés a 2, supporter les frais de scolarité de ses enfants, améliorer le niveau de son épargne dans le but de pouvoir dans le futur se procurer une maison et finalement améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille.
texts.en: Mr. Bakary lives in Senegal in one of its suburbs. He is married and has been in the sewing business for 20 years. He starts his day at 7am and gets home at 9pm. His earnings permit him to pay the rent and his family’s daily expenses. He is a member of the U-IMCEC branch where he lives and has already repaid three previous loans. He is seeking a loan of 200,000 fr to buy a sewing machine to make his sewing business more efficient. In developing his business, he hopes to diversify the products and services he offers to his clientele, increase the number of his employees to two, pay for his children’s schooling, increase the level of his savings in the hopes of one day buying a house, and finally to improve his family’s diet.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Jartu

texts.en:
Jartu, a widowed mother of six children between the ages of 19 and 31, lives in Paynesville South. Her children live independently; four are in college, and the other two are involved in business.

Having received start-up capital from her children, Jartu now owns a warehouse where she has been selling charcoal for the past five years. One of her business challenges is the cost of transporting the product from the brush to Monrovia. With her profits she buys more coal and repays her loans. Jatu is now requesting her third loan from BRAC Liberia to buy more charcoal to increase her sales. She hopes to become a big businesswoman in the future.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal to increase her sales.

loans.name: Iliassou

texts.fr: Iliassou est une homme de 42 ans célibataire, père de 8 enfants .. Il detient une boutique dans un coin de la place où il vend des épices et autres divers produits depuis 15 ans. Grace à son dynamisme et sa compétence dans ce domaine il s'est fait une clientèle grandissante qu'il n'arrive plusn à satisfaire. Ceci est dü à la petitesse de son capital. Pour cela Il sollicite un crédit qui lui permettra d'augmenter son stock des épices( poivre blanc, noir, piment en sachet, épices poulet, poisson, porc...)Les bénéfices tirés de ce prêt seront réinvestis en partie dans son activité pour l'agrandir, le reste l'aidera à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Iliassou is a 42-year-old single father of eight. He runs a corner boutique where he has been selling spices and other miscellaneous items for 15 years. Thanks to his energy and competence, he has gained a growing clientele, which he can no longer satisfy. This is due to the small size of his capital. He is seeking a loan which will allow him to increase his stock in spices (white pepper, black pepper, hot pepper in bags, chicken spices, fish spices, pork spices, …). The profits that come from this loan will be partially reinvested into his business to grow it, and the rest will help him to meet the needs of his family.

loans.use: to increase the stock of spices (white pepper, black pepper, hot pepper in bags, chicken spices, fish spices, pork spices, …)

loans.name: Jonathan Jesus

texts.es:
Jonathan es un hombre de 20 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar, Jonathan no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de soldadura, pero espera poder hacerlo muy pronto, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones come un riquísimo Arroz con Puré, el cual es su plato favorito.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jonathan trabaja en el área de abarrotes de un supermercado de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranos horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien porque es muy responsable y brinda un trato amable hacia los demás.
Jonathan se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea poder hacer el tarrajeo y pintado de gran parte de su vivienda y su habitación, ya que hace poco gracias a su esfuerzo, quiso ayudar a sus padres y han podido avanzar la construcción de su vivienda; de esta manera Jonathan espera poder seguir trabajando para apoyar a su familia y lograr su gran sueño de ser un buen profesional y terminar la construcción de su hogar, el cual brinde mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia.
texts.en:
Jonathan is a 20-year-old man. He's single and lives in the town of Chincha with his parents and siblings. He's a very kind, hardworking and enthusiastic person with a great deal of drive to overcome. Unfortunately, due to the lack of financial resources and the need to work in order to help his parents pay for their household's expenses, he couldn't study for a professional career in welding. However, he hopes to be able to do that very soon. During his free time he enjoys playing soccer with his friends. Occasionaly, he eats a delicious "arroz con puré" (rice with mashed potatoes), which is his favorite dish.
With a lot of hard work and dedication, Jonathan works in the grocery section of one of his town's supermarkets. Everyday he starts working from the early hours of the morning. He may work for about 8 hours, and he believes that he does well because he's very responsible and treats other people in a friendly way.
Jonathan is very thankful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he'll be able to do home improvements. He wishes to be able to plaster and paint a large portion of his house and his bedroom, because a short while ago he wanted to help his parents and, thanks to his hard work, they were able to enlarge their house. That way Jonathan hopes to be able to keep on working in order to support his family. He also hopes to achieve his biggest dream of being a good professional and finishing the construction of his house, which will increase his family's safety and well-bring.

loans.use: to do improvements in his home.

loans.name: Jannet

texts.en: Jannet is 42 years old and lives in Airport.  She is married and has eight children between 10 and 24 years old.  Five of them live at home and attend school.  Her husband works at RIA(Robert International Airport).  For the past 20 years she has been involved in a local cook shop business (restaurant).  She was taught by her mother how to do business.  She is requesting a loan to purchase rice, vita, oil, charcoal, fish, etc., for her business.  Her plan is to live a good life.

loans.use: to purchase rice, vita, oil, charcoal, fish, etc., for her business,

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 21 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven para ayudar a sus padres, Luis no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol y en algunas de estas ocasiones come una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Luis trabaja como obrero en una empresa de venta de materiales de construcción diversos, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas, en turnos rotativos y cree que le va bien porque es muy responsable y dedicado a su trabajo.
Luis se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que él desea poder hacer le tarrajeo, pintado y puesta de instalaciones en hogar; de esta manera Luis tendrá su hogar en mejores condiciones, adecuadas y seguras, que brinden mayor bienestar para él y su familia, así pues Luis espera seguir trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Luis is a 21-year-old single man who lives in the city of Chincha with his parents and siblings.  He's a very pleasant, hardworking, and enthusiastic person with a great desire for self-improvement.  Unfortunately, because he didn't have the financial resources and had to work from a young age to help his parents, he was unable to undertake professional studies, although he would have enjoyed doing so very much.  In his free time he likes to play soccer, and sometimes he eats a delicious "carapulcra con sopa seca" [a Peruvian stew].

On his own initiative, and with a lot of hard work and commitment, Luis works in a construction supply business.  He starts work very early every day and can work approximately 12 hours in shifts.  He believes it's going well for him because he's responsible and dedicated to his job.

Luis is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he'll be able to make improvements on his house.  He wants to be able to do the plastering, painting, and installations.  This way his house will be in better condition, suitable and safe for his and his family's greater well-being.

Luis expects to continue working and making the effort to achieve his big dream of having his own house.

loans.use: to make improvements on his house

loans.name: Jimmy Alonso

texts.es:
Jimmy es un hombre de 23 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Jimmy se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Computación e Informática, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas educativos en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias al apoyo de un familiar, Jimmy trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Jimmy se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como polos, pantalones, shorts, blusas, entre otras prendas de vestir; de esta manera Jimmy tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que poco a poco pueda ampliar su negocio y así lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Jimmy is a man of 23. He is single and lives in the city of Ica with his parents and siblings. He is a very friendly person, hard-working and enthusiastic, who has a great desire to achieve. Thanks to his effort and the support of his parents, Jimmy is now studying for a degree in computers and information. In his free time he likes to watch educational programs on television, and sometimes he cooks a very rich chicken with rice dish to share with his family.

With much effort and dedication and thanks to the help of a relative, Jimmy works in his little business of selling clothing for women as well as for men and children. Every day he begins his work in the early hours of the morning. He can work about 8 hours a day, and he believes that his work is going well for him because of his dedication and the friendly treatment he offers to his customers.

Jimmy is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help they offer he will be able to complete the purchase of merchandise such as polo shirts, pants, shorts, and blouses, among other clothing items. In this way, Jimmy will have his business well stocked. With this, he hopes to improve his sales and increase his income, which will help him greatly so that little by little he can expand his business and thus achieve his great dream of having his own  house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as polo shirts, pants, shorts, blouses, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase livestock for resale

loans.name: Oumue

texts.en: Oumue lives in Airport and has four children between 5 and 12 years.  For 15 years now she has been selling palm oil, pepper, bitter-ball in the local market.  She learned how to sell from her mother.  She likes how the business has given her money.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil, pepper, bitter-ball, for her business.  Her plan is to build a good house.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, pepper, bitter-ball, for her business

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is 29 years old.  He is married and blessed with two children. He is a livestock trader in Narok and has been running the business for the past three years, making a monthly income of KES. 20,000.


He is borrowing his first loan of KES.20,000 from KADET LTD, with which he intends to purchase more livestock for resale. The anticipated profit will be reinvested to boost the business. His dream is to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to purchase livestock for resale.

loans.name: Samia

texts.en: Samia a 58 year-old conservative woman.  She asked her son to take her place in the photo, as she refused for religious reasons. Samia has 8 sons and daughters.  The two oldest sons are working to help in supporting the family as she and her husband have only their retirement salaries for income. Now four of her children are in the university while the rest go to school.  She has applied for this loan in order to pay a part of the semester fees for each one of the four.

loans.use: to pay a part of the semester fees for each of her sons

loans.name: Laith

texts.en: Laith is 21 years old and single. He has two older sisters, and they all live with their parents. Laith is a university student who wants to get a bachelor's degree so he can find a good job after graduation. He has applied for this loan in order to pay his fees for the upcoming semester.

loans.use: to pay his fees for the upcoming semester.

loans.name: Abdulmajeed

texts.en: Abdulmajeed is 20 years old and single. He is the youngest of four brothers. Abdulmajeed is a university student, studying about sports and gymnastics. He has applied for this loan in order to pay his fees for the upcoming semester. He hopes he can become a school gymnastics teacher in the future and then learn to be a coach.

loans.use: to pay his fees for the upcoming semester.

loans.name: Luigi Geovanny

texts.es:
Luigi es un joven de 27 años de edad, vive en la alegre ciudad de chincha, la cual es muy visitada por los turistas en cualquier época del año, ya que posee playas hermosas y sobre todo una gastronomía variada. Luigi es un joven muy alegre, cuando tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho jugar futbol con sus vecinos y amigos de su barrio y en especial disfrutar de uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Seco con frejoles”.

Cada día Luigi trabaja en una empresa como empleado, el trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y también tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa a pedido ya que ofrece sus productos a sus compañeros de trabajo, asimismo con el fruto de su trabajo puedo solventar con mucho esfuerzo los gastos de sus estudios, ya que el se encuentra estudiando la carrera de ingeniería industrial; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy amable con los clientes y porque es muy responsable.

Luigi esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ya que gracias a ello el podrá solventar los gastos para la presentación de su tesis de estudios, lo cual le permitirá poder obtener su titulo universitario y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Tener su propia empresa y poder apoyar a su familia”.
texts.en:
Luigi is a young man who's 27 years old. He lives in the cheerful town of Chincha, which attracts a lot of tourists all year round because of its charming beaches and most of all its diverse gastronomy. Luigi is a very cheerful young man. When he gets some free time, he very much enjoys playing soccer with his neighbors and friends from his neighborhood. He especially likes to enjoy one of his favorite dishes, the delicious "seco con frejoles" (beef cilantro stew with beans).
Luigi works everyday for a company as an employee. He works about 8 hours a day and also owns a small business selling clothing by order. He offers his merchandise to his coworkers. With the fruits of his efforts and a lot of hard work, he was able to to pay for his studies. He's currently studying for a career in industrial engineering. He believes that he does well in his job because he's very friendly towards customers and also because he's very responsible.
Luigi is very thankful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he'll be able to pay for the costs of presenting his final dissertation. This will allow him to obtain his college degree and to keep on striving in order to accomplish his biggest dream: owning his own company and being able to support his family.

loans.use: to pay for the costs of presenting a dissertation.

loans.name: Teta

texts.en: Teta is 25 years old and lives in Airport, Liberia. She is single and has two children, 3 and 8 years old. They live at home and attend school. For the past 5 years, she has been selling rubber articles in the local market. She enjoys her business, because it keeps her busy. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rubber dishes, cups, plates and spoons for her business. She plans to use her income to support her children and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase rubber dishes, cups, plates and spoons to sell in her  business.

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en:
Hawa is 35 years old.  She lives in Paynesville South with her husband and three children between the ages of five and 14.  All three attend school. 

Hawa has a cook shop (restaurant) in her community where she has been selling food for the past 15 years.  She sells food six days a week and prepares different kinds of dishes everyday for her customers.  For example, she prepares fufu (a starchy dumpling) with soup, cassava leaves and palava sauce (a type of stew).  Because of the good service she provides to her customers, she makes a profit everyday.

She is requesting a loan in order to purchase more ingredients for her business.  Her future plan is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Nehmeh

texts.en:
Nehmeh is a 38-year-old single woman, who has been selling clothes, accessories, and perfumes for the past six years.  Nehmeh is a hardworking woman who puts a great deal of effort into proving herself among her relatives and neighbors.  She is a hard worker who would like to please everyone who requests a favor from her in a well-mannered way.

Nehmeh has applied for a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua in order to improve her accessories selling sector by expanding her stock to include a newly released collection.  She has been a borrower with Al Majmoua for four consecutive cycles, which has helped her to increase her products and expand her business.

Nehmeh hopes to continue improving her business and aims to increase the size of her shop and move to a better commercial area.

loans.use: to improve her accessories selling business by expanding her stock to include a newly released collection.

loans.name: Madres Unidas Group

texts.es:
Saludos desde Peru! La Sra. Marleni es integrante de la alcancía comunal “Madres Unidas”, un grupo conformado por 8 socias que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio.

Marleni trabaja en la preparación y venta al por mayor de maní confitado y maní salado a su vez vende comida en las noches y cuenta con clientes fidelizados.
Marleni ha solicitado el préstamo  para comprar insumos maní, azúcar etc. Su sueño es un día tener un local mas grande, para así poder atender mejor a sus clientes.

Marleni es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos. Gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación, Marleni ha logrado mejores ingresos económicos, se ha comprado una casa prefabricada , sus hijos van a la escuela. Marleni está muy contenta con este préstamo y agradece a Edaprospo y a Kiva.
texts.en:
Greeting from Peru! Marleni is a member of “Madres Unidas” (Mothers United), a Community Bank composed of 8 people who engage in different retail activities.

Marleni makes and sells sugar-coated and salted peanuts at wholesale price; she also sells meals in the evenings and she can count on established customers.

Marleni is requesting a loan to buy ingredients such as peanuts and sugar. She dreams of owning a bigger locale in order to better tend to her customers.

Marleni lives lives in a common-law relationship and she has 2 children. Thanks to her efforts and her dedication Marleni has succeeded in earning a better income, she has bought a prefabricated house and her children go to school. Marleni is very happy for this loan and she is grateful to Edaprospo and Kiva.

loans.use: To buy peanuts and sugar.

loans.name: Subhiya

texts.en: Subhiya is a 52-year-old married woman. She has four daughters. Her husband works in the public sector. Subhiya’s oldest two daughters, who are twins, have recently enrolled in the university. Therefore Subhiya has applied for this loan to pay for her daughters' semester fees as a help to her husband.

loans.use: to pay for her daughters' university semester fees

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan, tiene 44 años de edad, casado, tiene 5 hijos y vive en el municipio de Potrerillos, Cortes. El  tiene su propia fuente de ingresos desde hace 22 años se dedica  a la confección de ropa como camisetas, pantalones, buzos y otra ropa que le solicitan. Juan decidió solicitar un préstamo por 21,000 Lempiras con el cual se va abastecer de materia prima como variedad de telas, hilos, agujas y otros materiales para la confección de prendas de vestir. Este préstamo le va ayudar a estar preparado con materiales para la demanda que tiene en esta temporada navideña. Sus metas es hacer crecer el negocio con mayor clientela y que su familia tenga lo necesario, salud, educación vestuario y alimentación.
texts.en: Juan, 44, is married and has five children; he lives in the municipality of Potrerillos, Cortes.  He has his own source of income; he’s worked making clothes like t-shirts, pants, sweatshirts and others he’s requested for 22 years.   Juan decided to ask for a 21,000 Lempira loan to stock up on raw materials like an assortment of fabrics, thread, needles and other clothes-making supplies.  This loan will help him be prepared with supplies to meet Christmas demand.  His goal is to make the business grow with more customers and that his family has what’s needed: health, education, clothing and food.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, needles and other sewing supplies.

loans.name: Miguel Lauro

texts.es:
Don Miguel tiene 58 años de edad, soltero, vive solo con un hijo en una aldea de Nueva frontera, Santa Bárbara.
Don Miguel, toda su vida a realizado actividades agrícolas, con ganado y con muchos años de experiencia en el cultivo de maíz frijoles y café. La producción la vende en el mercado local de la zona. 
El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 25,000 lempiras y lo utilizara en la compra de fertilizantes y abonos para las fincas de café y cultivos de maíz y frijoles, además va realizar pagos a cortadores de café. Con la buena asistencia que le dará a sus cultivos espera obtener mejores cosechas e incrementar sus ventas. Su meta es comprar 10 vacas y un vehículo tipo camión para generar otros ingresos.
texts.en:
Miguel, 58, is single living just with his son in a village in Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara.  He’s worked his entire life in agriculture and animal husbandry.  He has many years’ experience with growing corn, beans and coffee.  He sells his production in the local market.

He’s requested a 25,000 Lempira loan to buy fertilizer and manure for the coffee farm and for the bean and corn crops.  He will also pay laborers to do the coffee pruning.  He hopes to attain better crop yields and increased sales with the good care he’ll provide his crops.  His goal is to buy ten cows and a truck to generate additional income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and manure and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Juan Diego

texts.es:
Juan es un joven de 19 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su familia, Juan se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Ingeniería de Sistemas, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas educativos en televisión y en algunas ocasiones si mamá cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para engreírlo.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Juan trabaja brindando  atención al público en un empresa financiera de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y trato amable hacia los demás.
Juan se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de sus materiales de estudios, tales como libros, folltería y otros materiales de escritorio; de esta manera Juan contará con los materiales necesarios para desarrollar sus estudios de manera satisfactoria, así pues Juan espera seguir trabajando y esforzándose para convertirse en un buen profesional y tener un buen trabajo, para que junto con su familia puedan salir adelante.
texts.en:
Juan is 19 years old. He is single and lives in the city of Chincha with his parents and brothers. He is a very kind, hardworking and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to move ahead. Thanks to his effort and the support of his family, Juan is studying for a professional career in Systems Engineering. In his free time, he likes to watch educational programs on television, and sometimes his mother cooks a delicious Carapulcra con Sopa Seca (meat and potato stew with noodle casserole) to spoil him.

With a lot of hard work and dedication, Juan works in customer service at a financial company in his city. He starts his work early in the morning every day. He can work approximately 8 hours and he believes it's going well for him because of his responsibility and his kind treatment of others.

Juan is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help given he will be able to buy materials for his studies such as books, brochures, and other school supplies. In this way, Juan will have the necessary materials to carry out his studies in a satisfactory way. Juan hopes to continue working and applying himself in order to become a good professional and have a good job, so that together he and his family can move ahead.

loans.use: to buy materials for his studies such as books, brochures, etc.

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en:
Hawa is 34, and a university student. She is also the single mother of two children; they are between the ages of 7 and 10, and are currently in school.

She started her provision shop with initial capital that she received from her cousin.  She has been selling candy, sardines, soft drinks, mineral water, hair grease, toothbrushs, bath soap, washing soap, and many other items for the past four years. She make profit when she sells because she is the only one in the community with a provision shop, and she has what her customers need. 

She is requesting this loan to purchase more candy, sardines, soft drinks, mineral water, hair grease, and bath soap to increase her sales. Her dream is to open a big store in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more candy, sardines, soft drinks, mineral water, hair grease, and bath soap to increase her sales.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 19-year-old single man, who has been in the business of selling hot drinks and coffee since 2008.  Mohamad was only 15 years old when he started his own business, as it was necessary for him to help his parents earn a living when he finished his intermediate studies.

Mohamad's cafe is in a van located on the side of a highway facing an auto showroom.  His location is very good but he needs support to improve his business. That is why he has applied for a youth loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua in order to buy a new espresso machine and an espresso coffee mill.  In addition, he wants to build a tent over his van to make his business easier during the coming winter season.  Most of his customers are passersby and tourists.

This is his third cycle with Al Mjamoua and he is a borrower in good standing with a history of repaying his previous loans.  Mohamad hopes to continue expanding his business as much as he can to please his customers and improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a new espresso machine and coffee mill.

loans.name: Plan Director - Cusco Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece  al banco comunal PLAN DIRECTOR-CUSCO; este banco está situado en el distrito de  Wanchaq en la provincia  de Cusco departamento de Cusco.

La socia Rosa tiene 44 años de edad ,03 hijos y es casada, la socia  alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza como colonias, perfumes, cremas entre otros, la socia vende de forma independiente a sus amistades,familiares y clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante  a su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería como perfumes para su negocio.

Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta son socios que pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.

Los otros socios se dedican a la venta de computadoras y el resto de socios invertirán en sus estudios como tesis, diplomado, pensiones de la universidad y bachillerato.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Introducing Rosa, a member of “Plan Director Cusco” (Project Principal – Cusco), a Communal Bank located in Wanchaq, a district of the province and department of Cusco.

Rosa is 44 years old, she is married and she has 3 children. She alternated her daily chores with her activity, selling beauty products such as cologne, perfumes and creams. She works independently, selling her products to friends, relatives and to customers who place orders with her. She has been engaged in this activity for a few years, and things are going well thanks to the dedication she daily works with. Rosa is a responsible and persevering person, as through this activity she provides for her family.

She is requesting a loan to buy products such as perfumes for her activity.

The members pictured in the separate photo have required permission to be late for the meeting due to their working engagements.
Some of the other members sell computers, while other will pay for various education costs, such as presenting dissertations, formalizing degrees, tuitions and Bachelor’s Degrees.

Rosa is grateful for the loan she has received and she commits to complying with the repayments of her dues according to schedule.

loans.use: La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería como perfumes para su negocio.

loans.name: Aurea

texts.es:
Áurea, de 46 años vive con Paulino de 54 años, juntos tienen 5 hijos que con gran esfuerzo obtuvo su casa de adobe. Desde hace tan solo 1 año Áurea decidió cambiar de rubro por ser consejera de maquillajes de puerta a puerta, pues anteriormente hacia el servicio de lavado de ropa, pero sus clientes en muchas ocasiones no le pagaban y esto a ella le traía muchos problemas. 
Actualmente camina día a día sola por muchos lugares y le agrada mucho conocer nuevos clientes aunque también dice que es una buena manera de hacer ejercicio. Sin embrago, el cansancio le resta la ganas de continuar, pero las ganancias que le deja y la necesidad que tiene su familia hace que saque fuerzas para continuar. Ahora, para continuar con su trabajo, debe amortizar los pedidos que realizan sus clientes con su fondo propio para así no perder la confianza que le brindan y evitar cobros apresurados que le generan incomodidad a sus clientes, además esta pensando en comprar productos en promoción que le permitan a ella venderlos para así generar ganancias extras.
Un de sus objetivos, comenta es el de abrir su propio local dedicado a las cosmetología como un salón de belleza para ello deberá trabajar arduamente para así acumular suficiente capital. Este es su préstamo número 02 y para ella significa bastante el solo hecho de saber que puede contar con MFP, le gusta pagar puntual y se siente muy cómoda por la manera en como trabaja con sus compañeros del banco comunal.
Con los 500 soles saldará las cuentas a sus proveedores para no perder la confianza y a la vez realizará  la compra de cosmétivos en promoción para su posterior venta con el fin de ganar dinero extra.
texts.en:
Áurea, 46, lives with Paulino, 54; they have five children together.  With much effort she obtained an adobe house.  A year ago she decided to change her line of work and become a beauty consultant door to door; she used to take in laundry but her customers often did not pay her and this brought her many problems.

She currently walks by herself to lots of places and she enjoys meeting new customers although she says it’s also a good way to do exercise.  However, she does get tired and that lessens her will to continue but thanks to the profits she earns and the need her family has she finds the strength to go on.  In order to continue working, she must amortize her customer orders with funds of her own in order to keep their trust and avoid having to insist on immediate payment that might be uncomfortable for some of her customers.  Besides, she’s thinking about buying products that are on special so when she sells them she’ll earn a little extra profit.

One of her goals is to open her own local like a beauty salon specializing in cosmetology but to do so she must work very hard to accumulate enough capital.  This is her second loan and it means a lot to her to know that she can rely on MFP.  She likes to make her payments punctually and feels very comfortable with the way her fellow communal bank members work.  She will use the 500 soles to pay her suppliers to keep their trust and at the same time will buy cosmetics on special for subsequent resale aimed at earning extra money.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Grimaldina

texts.es: Grimaldina de 37 años convive con sus 3 hijos: Ruth, Joselin y Grecy Fiorela, todos en la actualidad estudiantes gracias a su sustento que ella les da. Juntos habitan en una casa de material noble que aún esta inconclusa. Desde hace 10 años lidera su negocio propio, que consiste en el transporte de diversas mercaderías, encargandose de recepcionar las solicitudes y luego contrata los choferes para su transporte. En todo este tiempo, ha logrado ganar experiencia, uno de ellos, fue cuando su unidad se queda varada en plena ruta, ante esto cada cierto tiempo le da mantenimiento tecnico a su vehículo. Dentro de los planes que tenia en mente es ampliar su casa y así acondicionarla a una peluquería. Ahora solo pedírá un prestamo, el cual sería el segundo, para completar el monto que requiere y realizar la ampliación de su casa así como también los acabados.
texts.en: Grimaldina, 37 years old, lives with her 3 children, Ruth, Joselin, and Grecy Fiorela, all of whom are currently students thanks to the support she gives them. Together they live in a house made of high-quality materials that is still not finished. For 10 years, she has run her own business, which is transporting various kinds of merchandise, taking charge of receiving the orders and then contracting with drivers for the transportation. In all this time, she has succeeded in gaining experience. One instance of this was when her vehicle broke down in the middle of the road. Having faced that, she performs technical maintenance on her vehicle at regular intervals. Among the plans she has in mind is expanding her house and putting in a hairdressing shop. Now she will only ask for a loan, which will be her second, to reach the amount she needs and expand her house as well as perform the finish work.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and tile

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase goats for her dairy.

loans.name: Basil

texts.en:
Basil is 32, a farmer in Nkubu county in Kenya. He has been practicing mixed-farming for 4 years, producing milk and fruits which he sells to people in his local area.  He also operates a boda-boda business (bicycle or motorcycle transport) as an additional source of income.

He is requesting a 45,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase materials to construct a zero-grazing unit for his dairy cows.  A zero-grazing unit is a shaded, enclosed structure where fodder and water are brought, vs the cows roaming in the open, which facilitates catching diseases or damaging the environment. This will help him increase his production of milk, leading to more income and improvement of his living standards.  

Poor rainfall and pests are his major challenges in farming.

He aspires to buy his own car to help him in the transportation of his products.

Basil says Juhudi Kilimo has the best interest rates for small-scale farmers.

loans.use: To purchase materials for constructing a zero-grazing unit for his cows.

loans.name: Cleofe

texts.es:
Cleofe de 41 años, casada con Guillermo de 47 años; juntos tienen 4 hijos todos ellos varones: Alexander, Luis, Guillermo y Jefferson quienes desempeñan actualmente actividades estudiantiles. Esta linda familia habita una vivienda hecha de material noble que doña Cleofe y su esposo construyeron desde hace poco. Dando como siempre el apoyo necesario de pareja que requiere un matrimonio, Cleofe y su esposo lograron impulsar hasta hacer realidad hoy en día el negocio del trasporte y venta de agregados para construcción, desde hace 3 años que trabajan teniendo a su cargo camiones y maquinarias, a pesar del cuidado que requiere dicho rubro que ambos lo administran eso los motiva a seguir adelante pues es la primera vez que ambos laboran juntos y eso los hace sentir muy contentos. Aunque en algunos casos ocurren inconvenientes por parte de los vehículos que obligan a correr apuros en ocasiones siempre teniendo en cuenta que es necesario solucionarlos de manera inteligente. Por tales motivos y viendo bien el sistema de trabajo, Cleofe piensa que es necesario tener un dinero provisional para cualquier eventualidad ya que recién se esta iniciando con dicho negocio y es mejor evitar inconvenientes que obliguen los camiones  a quedarse varados.
De ir trabajando por la manera como lo ha estado haciendo, tiene pensado adquirir unidades para así hacer crecer el negocio hasta lograr hacer de el una gran fuente de ingreso para la familia. Este es su crédito número 05 con el cual se siente muy comprometida debido a que la puntualidad siempre a sido su virtud , por otro lado se siente muy cómoda también por la manera en como ha ido desempeñándose su banco comunal conjuntamente con ella.
Los 2,000 lo invertirá para su pequeña empresa, y mantener sus vehículos bien operativos a fin de no tener problemas en el transporte de agregados para la construcción que ella comercializa.
texts.en:
Cleofe, 41, is married to Guillermo, 47.  They have four children together, all boys: Alexander, Luis, Guillermo and Jefferson who are all currently students.  This lovely family lives in a house made of substantial materials that Cleofe and her husband built recently.  Providing the mutual support a couple must put into their marriage, Cleofe and her husband managed to strive and make reality their construction supplies transportation and sales business.  They’ve been working three years and have trucks and machinery on hand.  

Despite the care this particular line of work demands, they both manage it and they are motivated to continue forward because this is the first time they’ve worked together and this makes them very happy. Although sometimes the vehicles break down and they go through difficult moments they are always aware that they must solve them intelligently.   Because of this and seeing how well their work system is going, Cleofe thinks that it’s necessary to have some money on hand for any eventuality that may come up since they are recently starting the business and it’s better to avoid any inconvenience that might cause the trucks to remain idle.

From working the way they’ve been doing so far, she’s thinking about acquiring more units to make the business grow turning it into a great source of income for the family.  This is her 5th loan and she feels very committed because punctuality has always been a virtue of hers.  On the other hand, she feels very comfortable too with the way her communal bank has been working together with her.  She will use the 2,000 to invest in her small firm and keep her vehicles in good operating order so that she’ll have no problems with the transportation of construction gravel she sells.

loans.use: to service her dumptruck.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase irrigation equipment for her farm.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa de 50 años, una madre impulsadora que junto a su esposo Florencio han logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos.  Juntos conforman una hogar, de cuya casa esta hecha de adobe. El negocio al que se dedica es la venta de frutas, siendo su puesto de venta en un paradero interprovincial, un lugar donde hay mucha afluencia de gente. Hace cierto tiempo se le presentó la oportunidad de incrementar sus ventas, conocio a más proveedores de frtuas, logrando así abastecerse de variedad. Con el tiempo desea envíar de frutas a distintas zonas ya que recibió una propuesta. Lleva consigo 03 créditos hasta el momento por lo cual comenta muy entusiasmada que una de sus virtudes es el cumplimiento, agradece a sus compañeros de su banco comunal a la vez por ser personas muy optimistas quienes la motivan a seguir trabajando en grupo.
Con los 2,000 soles procederá a comprará frutas al por mayor para abastecer la demanda que existe en su puesto actualmente.
texts.en:
Teresa, 50, is a driven mother who, with her husband Florencio, has managed to get her children ahead.  Together they make up a household in a house made of adobe.

Her business is selling fruit in a sales stall in an interprovincial bus station, where there are a lot of people.  Some time ago she had the opportunity to increase her sales.  She met more fruit providers and managed to stock up with a variety.  In time she wants to send fruit to different regions because she received an offer.

She has had three loans up to the present, and she comments enthusiastically that one of her virtues is commitment.  She's grateful to her colleagues in the communal bank for being very optimistic people who motivate her to continue working in a group.

With the 2,000 soles [PEN] she'll buy fruit wholesale to satisfy the current demand in her stall.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fruit

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a water tank and water pipes for irrigation

loans.name: Lali

texts.en:
Lali is 25 years old. She lives in a small village in the Martvili District with her mother and grandmother who both are provided with retirement pensions. Lali requested loans from local financial institutions several times for her family-business start-up, but without any success. Her loan request was rejected all the time, because of her low income and the family’s poor living conditions. 

The source of the income for the family is an agricultural business. Lali has 2 milk cows, whose milk is used to produce cheese products which are sold in their village and nearby villages. Lali also has 5 bee-hives with bee colonies. She harvests the honey and sells it at the local open market. In addition, her mother trades with cereals. Their income is hardly enough for food for a three-member family. According to Credo estimations, the family belongs to the subsistence poor category. 

Lali has requested loan from Credo to start up a new family business. Her loan request was approved in the frame of new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to country-residing rural poor, who do not have access to traditional credit products,--they are typically regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income. Lali requested credit for the start-up of a grocery store with a sharer. With the requested credit she will purchase grocery products for resale. According to her estimations, her store will work well, as there are no other similar stores. She will attract clients with quality service and a wide assortment of products.

The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva Start-up loan will significantly improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to start a glocery store

loans.name: Moustafa

texts.en:
Moustafa is from Iraq. He is 39 years old, married, and has four children. He is the only provider for the family.

Moustafa owns a barber shop. He has acquired this professional skill by working as an employee in several barber shops. In 2005, he established his business and he now has an employee. He has a good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting a $2,400 loan to renovate his barber shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to renovate his barber shop.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: Elsa de 56 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja junto a ella en el negocio. Elsa es muy emprendedora y proactiva y siempre esta en vista de mejorar, ella posee una panadería que esta ubicada en su casa de habitación en donde realiza diferentes tipos de pan tanto dulces como salados, y que posteriormente vende de forma ambulante por diferentes colonias. Elsa solicita un préstamo con el cual pueda comprar latas nuevas para colocar la masa para el  pan y ponerlo en el horno y así incrementar la cantidad de pan que produce, lo que será de mucho beneficio para la estabilidad de su hogar.
texts.en:
Elsa is 56 years old.  She lives with her husband and they work together in their business.  Elsa is an enterprising and proactive woman who is always looking to make improvements.  She has a bakery that is located in her home.  Elsa produces different types of breads, both sweet and savory, and then sells them as a street vendor in different neighborhoods.  

She is requesting a loan so that she can buy new baking pans to hold the bread dough while it bakes in the oven.  This will allow her to increase the quantity of bread that she produces, so the loan will be a great benefit as she seeks to attain household stability.

loans.use: to buy baking pans for making bread.

loans.name: Eduardo Jesus

texts.es:
Eduardo es un hombre de 20 años, es soltero, vive  en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su madres, Eduardo se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones su mamá cocina un riquísimo Ceviche para engreírlo, ya que es su plato favorito. 
Con mucho empeño y dedicación Eduardo trabaja como promotor de ventas en una empresa de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien porque es responsable y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Eduardo se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de prendas de vestir para su venta, tales como polos, camisas, blusas, pantalones, entre otros; de esta manera Eduardo podrá contar con la mercadería necesaria para dar inicio a su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, así pues él espera seguir trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser un buen profesional y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Eduardo is a 20-year-old single man who lives in the city of Ica, district of Santiago. He is a very friendly person, hard working and enthusiastic, who greatly desires to improve.

Thanks to his efforts and the support from his mother, Eduardo is studying for a professional career in Business Administration.  He likes to play sports in his free time. Occasionally his mother spoils him by cooking a delicious Ceviche, as it is his favorite dish.

Eduardo is a hardworking and dedicated salesperson working for a company in his city.  Everyday he starts work very early in the morning and can work approximately 8 hours.  He believes things are going well for him because he is responsible and because of his kind treatment towards others.

Eduardo is very grateful for the assistance Kiva loans provide because through these he will be able to buy clothing to resell, such as sweaters, shirts, blouses, and pants among others.  This is how Eduardo will be able to count on the merchandise needed to start a small clothing business.  

So, he expects to continue to work and try his best to achieve his dream of being a good professional and to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as sweaters, bluses, pants, shirts, etc.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina de 36 años, madre de 3 hijos lleva una vida dedicada a su familia a lado de su esposo Víctor. Con el paso de los años lograron concretar una casa hecha con adobe el cual alberga a la familia en su conjunto. Dedicada por mas de 20 años a la producción de cacao admite que es un trabajo duro y requiere de toda la atención. Le agrada, el sembrado y colocación de injertos, admite ser una experta del caso. No obstante prefiere dejar el trabajo pesado para su pareja quien gustosamente accede debido a que llevan  una buena comprensión.  Las ultimas temporadas trajo consigo un buen resultado y a su vez buenas ganancias lo cual la esta motivando a adquirir mas almácigos e injertos y por consiguiente abono orgánico. Ella planea en adelante adquirir mas parcelas para trabajarlas de la misma forma e incrementar su capital de trabajo, es consiente que el éxito le sonríe cada vez más y ahora menos que nunca debe parar su ritmo de trabajo. Este es su préstamo número 06 por el cual agradece a MFP por la confianza brindada, confianza que ella piensa devolver con sus pagos puntuales, a su vez felicita a sus compañeros de su banco comunal por la responsabilidad demostrada hasta el momento. Con los 3,000 soles podrá comprar almácigos de cacao, asimismo injertos necesarios para incrementar la producción así como abono orgánico indispensables para garantizar una producción de calidad.
texts.en:
Marina is 36 years old and the mother of three children. Her life is dedicated to her family and her husband Victor. Victor and Marina built their own adobe house that their whole family lives in. For the last 20 years, Marina has worked growing cocoa beans. It is a hard job that requires much attention to detail. Marina, however, admits to being an expert at planting and grafting cocoa. Nevertheless, she prefers to leave the physically demanding tasks to her husband, who understands and gladly agrees to help out. 

The last few planting seasons had very good results and, in turn, good profits. This has motivated her to obtain more seedlings, grafts, and organic fertilizer. In the future, she plans to buy more plots of land to work in the same way and increase her working capital. Her business success makes Marina smile more. So, especially now, she knows that she should not slow the rhythm of her work.

This is Marina's sixth loan. She is very grateful that MFP trusts her to make her payments punctually. She also congratulates the other borrowers from her communal bank for the responsibility they have shown thus far. With the 3,000 soles loaned to her, Marina will be able to buy cocoa seedlings, grafts needed to increase production, and the organic fertilizer essential to guarantee quality production.

loans.use: to buy cocoa seedlings, grafts, and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Roberta

texts.es:
Con 45 años Roberta felizmente casada con Mauricio, juntos tienen 7 hijos. todos habitan en una casa construida a base de adobe. Amante del campo, lleva 25 años cultivando café, cuya producción se encuentra en sus parcelas heredadas de sus padres, pues le han valido mucho para sacar adelante a su familia. Su mano derecha Mauricio, siempre constante con la labor, indica que de no ser un trabajo en equipo esto no hubiese funcionado. Una de las cosas que le fascina a Roberta es la cosecha de los granos, reitera  que le agrada y relaja mucho, en consecuencia  llega incluso a ser mas rápida  que los jornaleros contratados. No obstante el trabajo pesado como el traslado de sacos la termina agotando. 
Para seguir produciendo necesita adquirir semillas de café así como abono  orgánico necesarios para garantizar una producción de calidad, con el fin de seguir acumulando para luego abrir una tienda  abarrotes. Obtenido su crédito número 17, reitera su compromiso con MFP, para lo cual indica ser muy cumplida. Agradece de antemano a sus compañeros de su banco comunal por la acogida y motivación que le imparten. Con los 3,000 soles planea adquirir  semillas de café, abono orgánico necesario y la contrata de jornaleros en esta etapa de producción inicial.
texts.en:
Roberta is 45 years old and happily married to Mauricio.  Together they have seven children and they all live in a house made from adobe.  She loves the country and has spent 25 years cultivating coffee.  She plants her crops on land inherited from her parents and they have used this to help their family get ahead.  Mauricio, her right hand, is always consistent with his work and indicated that without teamwork they would not have been able to succeed.  One of the things that fascinates Roberta is that harvesting the grains pleases and relaxes her, so in consequence, she is faster than the hired day laborers.  Nevertheless, hard work like moving the sacks leaves her exhausted.

In order to continue producing, she needs to acquire coffee seeds as well as organic fertilizer to guarantee a quality crop.  She hopes to continue saving so that she can later open a grocery store.  This is her 17th loan and she remains committed to working with MFP, so she will make her payments on time.  She thanks her fellow community bank members ahead of time for their welcome and the motivation they provide.  With the 3,000 soles requested she plans to purchase coffee seeds and organic fertilizer and to hire day laborers for the first phase of production.

loans.use: to purchase coffee seeds, organic fertilizer, and hire laborers.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en: Zainab is a 51-year-old single lady who is taking care of her old mother after her father passed away. She is applying for another loan to add more non-food goods to her inventory--goods such as cleaning products and small toys for the kids in the neighborhood.

loans.use: to add more non-food goods to her inventory

loans.name: Fedaa

texts.en: Fedaa is a 42-year-old conservative married woman. She asked her husband to take the photo instead as she refused to do it herself for religious reasons. Fedaa has four sons and daughters who she wants to provide with the best life that she can, together with her husband. Her husband is a vocational worker who specializes in building blocks and bricks. Fedaa is a tailor who makes clothes and also sells them. She often gets a small quantity of clothes from the free-zone market for sale at her house. Now Fedaa has applied for this loan to buy some sewing tools and fix the sewing machine that she has.

loans.use: to buy some sewing tools and fix her sewing machine.

loans.name: Saleh

texts.en: Saleh is a 30-year-old married guy. He is supporting his four family members with the income he makes out of his business selling prom and party dresses. Saleh has applied for this youth loan to add more evening dresses to what he sells.

loans.use: to add more evening dresses to his store.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Es un hombre emprendedor con deseos de superación y con muchas posibilidades de hacer algo grande con su vida, su mayor deseo es entregarle un mejor futuro a su familia buscando tener nuevos caminos y olvidándose de la delincuencia que los rodea. Tiene un grupo familiar por el cual se esfuerza día a día, es muy trabajador y desde hace un tiempo se dedica a la elaboración de pan, quesadillas, pastelitos, pan francés entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este trabajo y se siente orgulloso porque ha logrado que le dé buenos resultados,  su panadería es muy conocida porque tiene el pan mas exquisito, ya  tiene mucha clientela en un lugar que identifico como muy bueno para desarrollar sus actividades; su meta es tener mejores beneficios que le ayuden a cumplir sus sueños. Él tiene la convicción de que si aumenta su producción así aumentarán las ventas, es por eso que se acercó solicitar un crédito que le permita comprar harina, azúcar, leche, levadura etc. Agradece la colaboración que recibirá además tiene esperanza en Dios que no lo abandonará para ya no verse influenciado por malas compañías y estar siempre ocupado en obras buenas como ésta, para así velar de la mejor manera por su familia y ser ejemplo correcto para ellos.
texts.en: This borrower is an enterprising man with a desire to get ahead and great potential to do something big with his life. His greatest wish is to give his family a better future, helping them to find new paths and forget the crime that surrounds them. He has a family, and works hard for them every day. He is a very hard worker, and he has made bread, quesadillas, cakes, french bread, and other items for some time now. He has done this work for several years and is proud because he is doing well. His bakery is very well-known because he has the most delicious bread. He has a large customer base which he says is very good for his business. His goal is to make more income which will help him to reach his dreams. He is convinced that if he increases his production, his sales will also increase. For this reason, he has requested a loan for the purchase of flour, sugar, milk, yeast, etc. He thanks you for your support, and he has faith in God that God will not abandon him; he is not influenced by bad company and he is always occupied with honest work such as his bakery. He works hard to ensure the best for his family and to be a good example for them.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, milk, and yeast.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una joven mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar, ella posee una panadería y ya tiene tiempo con el negocio, eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias,  comercia desde su vivienda y es muy conocida por las personas de la localidad se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por que vende el pan mas exquisito elaborado con material de calidad, a buenos precios y sobre todo por el servicio excelente; es una mujer luchadora, dedicada a su labor todos los días se esfuerza por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos caminos y alejada de la violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en que reside, día a día se esmera al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar harina, azúcar, dulce, leche, levadura etc. La joven esta entusiasmada y agradecida con el apoyo, sabe que tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: The wish to get ahead is one of the most important dreams of this young woman who lives with her family group. She has a bread bakery and has had this business for some time. This has given her valuable experience in sales that allows her to obtain better earnings. She sells from her home and is very well known by the people in her area. She has gained many customers who prefer her because she sells the most delicious bread of the best quality at good prices and above all with excellent service. She is a fighter who strives every day to have a better future with new roads and away from the crime of which she has been a victim in the area where she lives. Day to day she works as hard as she can because she is happy with her work and does not want to dissapoint her her family. In the last few weeks demand for her products has increased and she needs to make a new investment. That is why she is asking for a loan that will allow her to buy flour, sugar, dulce de leche, milk, yeast, etc. She is enthusiastic and grateful for the support. She knows she has good payment references and is very responsible. She is sure she can pay off the debt and is confident that she can bring financial security to her small home.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, dulce de leche, milk, and yeast.

loans.name: Emcograb Group

texts.es:
Don José tiene 66 años de edad, es casado, tiene cinco hijos los cuales ya son independientes y vive en el municipio del Níspero, Santa Bárbara junto a su esposa, una hija y un nieto.

El tiene 40 años de dedicarse a la agricultura con el cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Esta producción la almacenan en silos metálicos mientras la venden, sus clientes son del mercado local. Siendo esta actividad su fuente de ingresos. El sueña con sacar grandes cosechas de granos básicos, ser un agricultor grande y poderles dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Don José ha solicitado varios prestamos a ODEF con el actual lleva 26, de los cuales cuatro ciclos en forma grupal, agradece por este apoyo a ODEF y ahora a Kiva. 
El grupo se llama Emcograb y está formado por 10 integrantes, pero en esta solicitud solamente se incluyen cinco que en la fotografía se identifican así: al frente esta doña Sandra, al derecha Eustaquio, atrás el de sombrero es Jose Olvi, el de camisa azul rayada es Ramiro y al fondo esta don Jose. Todos viven en la misma comunidad y se dedican  a la agricultura de granos básicos. 
El préstamo grupal suma un total de 106.000 Lempiras y lo utilizaran para compra de insumos, semillas mejoradas de maíz y frijoles y pago de mano de obra. Con el fin de mejorar la producción y su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José, 66, is married and has five children who are all independent now.  He lives in Níspero, Santa Bárbara with his wife, daughter and grandson.  He’s been working in agriculture for forty years growing corn and beans.  He stores his grain in metallic silos while it's waiting to be sold.  His customers are from the local market.  This activity is his source of income.  He dreams with having great basic grain harvests, to be a great farmer and to be able to give his family better quality of life.  José has requested several ODEF loans.  He’s had 26 of them counting the current one; four of them were group loan cycles.  He thanks ODEF for this support and now Kiva too.

The group is called “Emcograb” and it has 10 members but only five of them are included in this loan request.  In the photo they are identified thus: Sandra is in front, Eustaquio is on the right, the one behind wearing the hat is José Olvi’s, Ramiro is wearing the blue striped shirt and José is in the rear.  All of them live in the same community and work in basic grain agriculture.

The group loan sums 106,000 Lempiras and they will use it to buy supplies, enhanced corn and bean seeds and to pay labor costs aiming at improving production and their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies, enhanced corn and bean seeds and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Haidar

texts.en:
Haidar is from Iraq. He is 32 years old, married, and has two children. He is the only provider for the family.

Haidar owns a car repair shop. He specializes in repairing car bodies. He established his business in 2000 and has now an employee. He built a good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting $2,400 loan to renovate his shop and buy some equipment for his business. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better life conditions.

loans.use: to renovate his shop and buy some equipment for his business.

loans.name: Kumba

texts.en:
Kumba, aged 33, lives together with her friend in Paynesville South. She stopped her education in the 8th grade.

Her friend is a businessman. He gave her the initial capital to start in this business. For the past six years, Kumba has been selling used clothes in the market. She sells both children's clothes and ladies' blouses. Some difficulties she faces are low sales during the rainy season and the competition in the market.

She makes a profit when she sells because of her good interaction with her customers, who flow in every day. She is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for the business. Her plan for the future is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en: Abeer is a mother of two daughters (6 and 3 years old) and a 4-year-old son. Using her first loan, she was able to add wedding dresses to her store for sale and for rental at a reasonable price. She has applied for this youth loan in order to get more wedding accessories such as bridal tiaras, hair accessories, and even special bridal jackets and sleeves in order to sell them at her store.

loans.use: to get more wedding accessories to sell.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es:
La señora Alejandra tiene 46 años de edad, tiene tres hijos. Desde muy joven se ha dedicado a trabajar para ayudar a su numerosa familia, junto con su madre trabajaba en un negocio de elaboración y venta de pupusas. Desde hace 8 años administra ella sola el negocio, y también posee una tienda productos básicos; debido a que su mamá esta muy anciana y Alejandra cuida de ella y de sus hijos. 

Ella viaja a la ciudad que esta a quince minutos en autobús del lugar de donde vive, para comprar los insumos que necesita. Ella sale temprano de su casa para regresar temprano y preparar la venta. El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar productos para su tienda y materia prima para elaborar las pupusas. Con la inversión ella surtirá su negocio y mejorara su local para brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes. Ella desea instalar una granja de cerdos para continuar apoyando a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Alejandra is 46 years old and has three children.  Since she was very young, she has been working to support her large family, and together with her mother, she worked in a shop where they made and sold pupusas (a traditional El Salvadoran snack made from corn dough wrapped around a filling and fried on a flat grill).  For the past 8 years, she has been running the business alone, and she also owns a small grocery store; her mother is very old now and Alejandra takes care of her and her own children.

She travels to the city about 15 minutes by bus from her home to buy the ingredients that she needs.  She leaves very early in the morning from her house so as to return early and prepare her store for business.  The loan she is asking Fundación Campo for is to buy products for her shop and ingredients for making pupusas.  With this investment, she will fill her store and improve her business to give better service to her customers.  She wants to install a pig pen to continue supporting her children.

loans.use: to buy products for her shop and ingredients for making pupusas (stuffed tortillas).

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: La señora Yolanda tiene 44 años, vive con su esposo, tienen 3 hijos que dependen de ellos. Un hijo se encuentra estudiando  en la escuela de la Ciudad de Monteagudo, cursando el nivel secundario, y su otra hija se encuentra estudiando en la universidad de Sucre, y su otro hijo se encuentra  en estado de rehabilitación en Sucre, sufre de parálisis físico.
